scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life

incident_updates.body: Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service. OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date. Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date. --------------------------------------------------- Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service. OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date. Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

Start time : 01/09/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 01/09/2022 07:00 UTC Service impact : Two set of a few seconds of flapping (switchover) Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, a network equipment will undergo an maintenance operation.
The maintenance has been postponed. Here is the new schedule : Start time : 05/09/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 05/09/2022 23:59 UTC

Start time : 13/09/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 13/09/2022 06:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of the rack L107A04.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
